website_summaries.verdict: Pentax's Optio Z10 isn't quite as nice as the company's Optio S10, but its attractive price helps make up for its quirks and modest feature set.
pros: The Pentax has a 7x optical zoom lens
cons: no optical or sensor-shift image stabilization

customer_reviews.title: Pentaz Optio Z10
customer_reviews.text: Flawless performance for years now and I take a lot of pictures. The battery still recharges well. Picture quality is great. the Price was right. Best feature is the fact that the lense does not project from the camera when zooming out. Makes it easy to take pix undetected. Slide cover keeps lens protected. Drawback is that it's so small that its hard to hold, but I overcame the situation by attaching a tripod base to it. This allows for a good grip, and lets the camera stand upright on a surface for unattended pix and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Big Spender

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for travel
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased for my husband to travel to Indonesia into the rain forest for work. He is a paramedic and loved the 7x zoom, the fact that the camera is water resistant is helpful in the rainforest enviroment that he is traveling in. The small compact design and great price all were factors in our buying this camera. We first saw it at [...] but item was sold out when we went to purchase it so i found it on Amazon and was very happy with the price and service.
customer_reviews.author: B. Getty

customer_reviews.title: amazing photos for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for my teenage daughter to photograph wolves. The zoom was incredible, and one of her close-ups photos was posted on a website. That photo beat out a number of photos taken with more expensive cameras. She's also taken indoor photos for a local animal rescue site, and the photos are perfect. I'm amazed at the negative reviews. The camera beats my Sony Cybershot for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aptos55

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: My wife has had one of these for a number of years. Great features and tremendous range. Michael Oswalt
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with Pentax products. I had an A10, and I was really happy with it. But I cracked the LCD screen so I just bought another camera. This Z10 was it. It's small, easy to use and good picture quality for my personal purposes. I'd give it 5 stars, but the plastic casing is not as nice as my old A10, but the sliding cover to power on is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera to replace an exact duplicate I'd been using for 6.5 years. The flash stopped working in my original and I was quoted $95 to have it fixed. I was very happy to find this camera on Amazon, as I'd shopped around for new cameras and did not find anything I liked. This camera takes quality photos without the complicated frills and nonsense that newer cameras have these days.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Got mine new for under $100
customer_reviews.text: I bought the z10 to carry in my purse. I like its convenience but am not thrilled with the picture quality. Outside shots aren't too bad but inside shots tend to be grainy. I bought mine here on Amazon for less than $100 so the $300+ price tag I am seeing right now is absurd.
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: Pentax camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice camera. It doesn't have a lot of built-in memory but I got an SD card to make up for the lack. The quality of the pictures is pretty good and it takes moving pictures surprisingly well. All in all, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ydnicuol

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much that I got on line and ...
customer_reviews.text: I lost my camera identical to this one in an airport. I didn't discover it till the next day when I got home. I liked it so much that I got on line and searched till I found the same camera. I took a picture from the fence at the White House with the close up, and could see the face of the guard on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Swoveland

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a camera with more zoom,I was hoping for at least 10, but all the cameras I looked at were so big. I came upon the Pentax and decided to give it a try. Could not be happier,this camera is so easy and having the lense covered is great.Can carry in my purse or pocket. 7x zoom is plenty for me at this stage of my picture taking. Don't hesitate on buying this camera!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MELA

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement camera for our foreign exchange student who broke hers. Just what she was looking for, and good value.
customer_reviews.author: C. McCloud

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: nice features, very slim camera and no protruding lens. Must read the manual to fully understand the features. Where can you see a camera with 8MP 7X optical zoom with this kind of slim camera, with a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: eurich0301

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this is my fav camera sliding open the lens cover is a very quick way to turn it on and off
customer_reviews.author: Hose PD

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: What a nice little camera,so far every picture I have taken day or night,inside or outside has been outstanding. Its very easy to use right out of the box,I have not tried all the bells and whistles on the camera yet,but for basic picture taking its great.
customer_reviews.author: Rex B. Conaway

customer_reviews.title: Small, great picture quality, affordable
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS MY 4TH PURCHASE OF THIS CAMERA. I HAVE GIVEN IT TO MY TEENAGE GRANDCHILDREN AND THEY LOVE IT, AS DO I. THE EASE TO OPERATE, THE GREAT PICTURE QUALITY, AND THE PRICE MAKE THIS A GIFT THAT KEEPS ON GIVING. JHO, lAWRENCEVILLE, GA.
customer_reviews.author: J. Overton

customer_reviews.title: Big quality from a little camera
customer_reviews.text: Our Pentax is a replacement for a previous one we had gotten last year, which got damaged in a collision with a closing car door. We didn't even consider another brand or model, we were so pleased with the picture quality, size and the 7x zoom. It's the perfect camera for us.
customer_reviews.author: Don Apgar

customer_reviews.title: great camera ..does everything...i like all its features and it is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this is a great camera...easy to use and many many features..I like that i can edit the pics on the camera...my sister likes hers too...
customer_reviews.author: T. bohannon

customer_reviews.title: Great digital camera
customer_reviews.text: My new Pentax Optio Z10 at 8 megaixels is absolutely fantastic. So easy to use, carry,focus and get completely good clear results. The expanded movie mode is particularly good with great ease of use and playback. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Swallow

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: has been a good buy and is still good for the intended use very compact and easy to use should be good for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Penny Logston

customer_reviews.title: Pentax Optio Z10
customer_reviews.text: It serves my purpose. Without the extending lens, it fits on CCTV bracket to mount for my windshield. Batteries don't last very long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R. Long

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality was terrible. I tried several different functions but every picture I took was very grainy. Also the slider that turns the camera on and off moves way too easily.
customer_reviews.author: EMW

customer_reviews.title: A MASTERPIECE
customer_reviews.text: This really is a remarkable camera. The moving-mirror zoom is one of those ideas which makes you wonder why somebody did not think of it and implement it sooner and works well. Picture quality is impressive and the quality of the colour is fantastic. And all at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Needs some vibrancy to the colors
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the price and I do like the extended zoom capability. However, the pictures are not as vibrant as my Canon A-95.
customer_reviews.author: Clay45

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was extremely quick. The product is everything I expected. A great gift.
customer_reviews.author: P. Holladay

customer_reviews.title: GREAT affordable Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how many features this camera has! I love that it has a slim design. There are so many great shooting modes! And Photo editing features built right into the camera! The only downside to the camera that I've noticed so far is that it doesn't take night time pictures very well, or record night time video well. I would highly recommend this camera !
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The auto-picture scan is a great feature and usually chooses the best way to get the optimal picture quality for each snapshot. Durable and user-friendly, the Optio Z10 is a great make by Pentax. I especially appreciate the mirrored zoom, so the lens doesn't have the chance to get stuck while focusing upon an object. Good for beginners and intermediate photographers. Not your typical point-and-shoot, especially with the 7X optical. Also appreciate the equally clear picture quality even when zoomed to the maximum capacity. Would recommend at once to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Little Bit

customer_reviews.title: Dream cam. 7x zoom in your pocket.
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain. I love my new Pentax. The zoom is great and the camera fits in my shirt pocket, perfect combination. Battery life is fantastic, the best battery life I've ever seen. Pros: 8MP, 7x (very nice zoom, great idea for such a small camera), size is perfect for travel or just fun events, battery life. Cons: Just a minor thing, it took a bit of time to get used to holding due to it's small size. At first you feel like your fingers are in the way. Definitely worth getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: everyday camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little camera. It's great for carrying in a pocket and having at a moment's notice. I love the way it works, sliding open the lens cover to turn on, zooming with no lens protruding. I would say the camera was perfect except that it's photos are not quite as vivid as a heavier Kodak that I carry to special events, but cannot put in my pocket. The rechargeable battery is a very nice accessory, and a cost saver. I have had no problem with the camera, enjoy using it, and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Whelan

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this camera. I own a Pentax digital SLR so of course when it came time to get a point & shoot, I went with trusty Pentax. I love the 7x zoom and 8 mega pixels is more than enough for a point & shoot. It's so much smaller that it appears in the pictures (which is good). I highly recommend this camera. It's becoming discontinued because new models are coming out (this one is much better), so hurry!
customer_reviews.author: Emotal Soul

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the money. It was extremely easy to figure out all of the options, and I am sure that anyone who is somewhat used to digital cameras would agree. I love the zoom!
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Severson

customer_reviews.title: Good price, low quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: Excellent outdoors picture quality, poor indoors use. Pictures taken with flash indoors turn out grainy or distorted. Warranty poor. I just bought the new CANON POWER SHOT SX200IS. GREAT GREAT GREAT You just can't mess up the pictures. Wonderful ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Had a previous version of a Pentax Optio so I am familiar with their design. Lots of impromements over the previous version. Picture quality is superb, and lots of new options for taking pictures. All in all a great camera choice for around $100.00.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H

customer_reviews.title: Pentax Optio Z10
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I see with this camera is that in bright conditions outside you cannot see the screen or picture you are taking. Most cameras have done away with the little viewfinder; it sure would be nice to have one. Other than that, this camera is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Don Darling

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pentax Optio Z10, it is small easy to travel with. I love how you just slide the lens cover to turn on and off. takes great pictures
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Pentax z10
customer_reviews.text: This product to date has met all my expecations in terms of size, ease of use, mobility, and picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A. Sargent

customer_reviews.title: If you take indoor pictures, don't buy this camera!
customer_reviews.text: It's very simple. You can only use this camera outdoors (in enough light). Indoor pictures are EXTREMELY grainy. I know how to use a digital camera and this one is terrible. Please read the bad reviews on Amazon before purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this camera and I love it! The pictures turned out great. Its easy to use and the 7X zoom is such a nice feature. The price was just right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Optio Z10 from a salesman that assured me this was THE camera to be used on my frequent excursions in the outdoors. I loved the fact that the lens did not extend from the camera body (1 less moving part) what I did not realize is that the LCD screen is so fragile, it cracked while in the camera case on my belt. Having bought an extended warranty I was informed Pentax would not cover the damage. I wasted $300.00 on the camera and warranty and was given very poor service in the repair shop. Don't be a sucker like I was and buy a good product from a responsible company.
customer_reviews.author: L. Meister

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's my first digital camera and I can't imagine a better camera. It meets all my simple needs. The picture is bright, clear, and has accurate colors. It's so easy to use - not complicated. I am very pleased with my purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carrato

customer_reviews.title: Pentax Optio z10
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace one of the same. Delivered on time & works so far, so good...
customer_reviews.author: M California

customer_reviews.title: Compact Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the compact design for its mobility. Also the built in 7X optical zoom produces high quality closeups as well as clear distance shots.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to replace Sony that was stolen. Great camera. Takes unbelievable pictures, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Promising specs, Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I love pentax. With my previous pocket pentax (optio 550) had amazing pictures, but the promising Z10 was a bad bet, which I regret. If you are looking for a large zoom, get the panasonic lumix.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nir

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I owned an optio s5z a 5mp camera and the picture quality was better and the optio z10 an 8mp camera, pictures to grainy.
customer_reviews.author: cez

product_meta.title: Pentax Optio Z10 8MP Digital Camera with 7x Optical Zoom
product_meta.description: Cl) Pentax Optio Z10 Digital Camera
feature_bullets: 8.0-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
High-speed Face Recognition; Auto Picture mode
Compatible with SD/SDHC memory cards (not included); 52 MB built-in memory

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars64 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
